interesting_fact: Has 50 states and the world's largest economy.
Home to the Great Wall and giant pandas.
Second-most populous country with rich cultural and historical heritage.
Largest rainforest, Amazon, is located in this beautiful country.
World's largest country spanning two continents, Europe and Asia.
Famous for sushi, samurai, cherry blossoms, and advanced technology.
Known for beer, engineering, Oktoberfest, and the Autobahn highway.
Comprises England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland together.
Eiffel Tower, croissants, fashion, and rich artistic heritage.
Has more lakes than any other country on Earth.
Home to kangaroos, Great Barrier Reef, and vast deserts.
Hosts three capital cities and diverse wildlife reserves.
Home to the Colosseum and famous Italian cuisine.
Known for flamenco dance, bullfighting, and La Tomatina festival.
Birthplace of chocolate and home to Chichen Itza.
Famous for K-pop, technology, and delicious Korean BBQ.
Birthplace of tango and home to Patagonia.
Ancient pyramids and the Sphinx attract millions of tourists.
Istanbul spans two continents, Europe and Asia.
Home to Islam's holiest sites, Mecca and Medina.
Land of Smiles, famous for temples and beautiful beaches.
Rich history, stunning landscapes, and delicious street food.
Birthplace of democracy and home to ancient ruins.
Famous for windmills, tulips, and cycling culture.
Known for Vikings, ABBA, and innovative design.
Famous for chocolate, watches, and breathtaking Alpine scenery.
Birthplace of fado music and famous for port wine.
